Description of incident: More than a hundred Colorado dentists              and their patients could be at risk for identity theft after a car              containing a bag of sensitive information was stolen. Authorities              found the car a few days later at an apartment complex where one of              the alleged thieves lived. Inside the unit, police discovered a massive              amount of personal information from previous crimes. Social Security              numbers, dates of birth, credit card numbers, pin numbers              to those credit cards, and photo IDs of the individuals              they stole credit cards from were all in the bag.
